name: Inside the mind of an Oshaberi
name_original: Inside the mind of an Oshaberi
description:
this is just something I created, because I felt like I needed to

I hope it makes your life better in some way. Enjoy!

It's not really a game, and there's not much of an objective, but you can use the mouse button, touchscreen, arrow keys or WASD to do things (squeak or move)

MUSIC CREDITS:
Midsummer Sky by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
